title: FS: 20 Card Graded T206 Lot - Lower Grade **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: 20 Card Graded T206 Lot - Lower Grade **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. As you can see by the scans, these are lower grade cards. All have been professionally graded.  Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions. Payment via any method you prefer. Please add $2 for shipping for 1-2 cards. Three or more cards ship for free.

Take the remaining lot (12 cards) for $190 delivered.

Cards Pictured (removing **SOLD** cards for easier reading):

Criss SGC 20 - $22
Dorner SGC 10 - $16
Geyer SGC 10 - $15
Hahn GAI 1.5 - $18
Hayden SGC 10 - $16
King (SL) SGC 10 - $30
Lake (Sovereign) SGC 10 - $18
McGlynn PSA 2 - $22
Schirm SGC 10 - $15
Westlake (SL) SGC A - $20
I. Young SGC 10 - $13

I will take the Tolstoi Stovall.

Thanks - Rob

I will take the Howell and Street.
Email sent.
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Take the rest of the lot (12 cards including 2 SL'ers) for $190 delivered.  Thanks!
I'll take the Mike Mitchell.  Email Sent.
